QuestData.Title: Claimant to the Throne
QuestData.Description:
I have dedicated myself to saving Azeroth from destruction time and time again, and this fool thinks he can just swoop in and claim the title of aspect? I think not.
Talk to my people, $n. See what they have to say about me and what I have done for this world.
QuestData.RewardText: Surely you back my claim, do you not, $n?
